com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.message

Class Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ciscowebex.androidsdk.message.Message

  • public class Message
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a Message on Cisco Webex.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Message.Draft
      Encapsulating the content will be post.
      static class  Message.Text
      The wrapper for the message text in different formats: plain text, markdown, and html.
